lead_paragraph: In selecting the right-hander Justin Dunn and and the left-hander Anthony Kay, the team was almost as surprised at how things worked out as everyone else.

headline.main: Even the Mets Marvel at Drafting Two Long Islanders
headline.print_headline: Mets Didn’t Set Out to Keep Picks Local

snippet: In selecting the right-hander Justin Dunn and and the left-hander Anthony Kay, the team was almost as surprised at how things worked out as everyone else.
